Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player

Class Card

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.Card
public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
the Card of the player, each player chooses one card, it's a description, the player will be decorated according to the card chosen
